gifcards.title: iTunes Gift Card
gifcards.description: Perfect for purchasing apps, games, music, movies, and more from the iTunes Store. Compatible with all Apple devices and services.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem directly in the iTunes Store or App Store on your Apple device
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for use in iTunes Store only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. No expiration date. Subject to iTunes Store terms and conditions.

gifcards.title: Steam Wallet Codes
gifcards.description: Add funds to your Steam Wallet to purchase games, DLC, and in-game content from the Steam Store. Instant digital delivery.
gifcards.redeem: Log into Steam, go to 'Redeem a Steam Wallet Code' and enter your code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Steam Store purchases only. Cannot be transferred or exchanged for cash. Subject to Steam Subscriber Agreement.

gifcards.title: PlayStation™Store Gift Cards
gifcards.description: Purchase games, add-ons, themes, and more from the PlayStation Store. Compatible with PS4, PS5, and PlayStation Network.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem through PlayStation Store on your console or via web browser
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for PlayStation Store purchases. Cannot be returned or exchanged for cash. Subject to PlayStation Network Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Google Play Code
gifcards.description: Use to purchase apps, games, movies, books, and more from Google Play Store. Perfect for Android users and Google services.
gifcards.redeem: Open Google Play Store app, go to Menu > Redeem and enter your code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Google Play Store purchases only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Google Play Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Roblox Digital Gift Card
gifcards.description: Get Robux to customize your avatar, buy game passes, and unlock premium features in Roblox games. Perfect for young gamers.
gifcards.redeem: Visit roblox.com/redeem and enter your gift card code to add Robux to your account
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Robux and Roblox Premium only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Roblox Terms of Use.

gifcards.title: PUBG Mobile UC
gifcards.description: Purchase Unknown Cash (UC) for PUBG Mobile to buy premium battle passes, skins, and exclusive in-game items.
gifcards.redeem: Open PUBG Mobile, go to the UC purchase section and use the redemption code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for PUBG Mobile UC purchases only. Cannot be transferred between accounts. Subject to PUBG Mobile Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Amazon Gift Card
gifcards.description: Shop for millions of items on Amazon with this versatile gift card. Perfect for books, electronics, home goods, and more.
gifcards.redeem: Enter the gift card code at checkout on Amazon.com
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Amazon purchases only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Amazon Gift Card Terms and Conditions.

gifcards.title: Netflix Gift Card
gifcards.description: Enjoy unlimited streaming of movies and TV shows with a Netflix subscription gift card. Perfect for entertainment lovers.
gifcards.redeem: Visit netflix.com/redeem and enter your gift card code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Netflix subscription only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Netflix Terms of Use.

gifcards.title: Spotify Gift Card
gifcards.description: Enjoy premium music streaming with ad-free listening, offline downloads, and high-quality audio on Spotify Premium.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem at spotify.com/redeem with your gift card code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Spotify Premium subscription only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Spotify Terms and Conditions.

gifcards.title: Xbox Gift Card
gifcards.description: Buy the latest games, add-ons, and more from the Microsoft Store. Works on Xbox consoles and Windows PC.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem on Xbox console or Microsoft Store online
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Microsoft Store purchases only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Microsoft Terms of Use.

gifcards.title: Visa Gift Card
gifcards.description: Universal gift card accepted anywhere Visa is accepted. Perfect for any occasion and gives complete spending flexibility.
gifcards.redeem: Use like a regular Visa card at any merchant that accepts Visa
gifcards.termsConditions: Subject to Visa Gift Card Terms and Conditions. Fees may apply. Cannot be exchanged for cash.

gifcards.title: Apple Gift Card
gifcards.description: Use for purchases at Apple Store, iTunes, App Store, and more. Compatible with all Apple devices and services.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem directly in any Apple Store or online at apple.com
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Apple Store and iTunes purchases. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Apple Terms and Conditions.

gifcards.title: Fortnite V-Bucks
gifcards.description: Purchase V-Bucks for Fortnite to buy Battle Passes, outfits, pickaxes, gliders, emotes, and more in the Item Shop.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem in Fortnite game or Epic Games Store
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Fortnite V-Bucks only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Epic Games Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Minecraft Minecoins
gifcards.description: Buy Minecoins to purchase skins, texture packs, worlds, and more from the Minecraft Marketplace.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem in Minecraft game through the Marketplace
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Minecraft Marketplace purchases only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Microsoft Terms of Use.

gifcards.title: League of Legends RP
gifcards.description: Purchase Riot Points (RP) for League of Legends to buy champions, skins, and other in-game content.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem in League of Legends client or Riot Games website
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for League of Legends RP only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Riot Games Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Call of Duty Points
gifcards.description: Purchase COD Points to buy Battle Passes, operator skins, weapon blueprints, and other premium content in Call of Duty games.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem in Call of Duty game or Battle.net
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Call of Duty Points only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Activision Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Apex Legends Coins
gifcards.description: Buy Apex Coins to purchase Legends, Battle Passes, Apex Packs, and cosmetic items in Apex Legends.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem in Apex Legends game or Origin/EA App
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Apex Legends Coins only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to EA Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Valorant Points
gifcards.description: Purchase Valorant Points to buy agents, weapon skins, and battle passes in Riot Games' tactical shooter.
gifcards.redeem: Redeem in Valorant game or Riot Games website
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Valorant Points only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Riot Games Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Microsoft Office 365
gifcards.description: Get access to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and more with a Microsoft Office 365 subscription. Includes cloud storage.
gifcards.redeem: Activate at office.com/setup with your product key
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Microsoft Office 365 subscription only. Subject to Microsoft Software License Terms.

gifcards.title: Adobe Creative Cloud
gifcards.description: Access Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, and 20+ creative apps with Adobe Creative Cloud subscription.
gifcards.redeem: Activate at adobe.com with your redemption code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Adobe Creative Cloud subscription only. Subject to Adobe Terms of Use.

gifcards.title: Norton 360 Antivirus
gifcards.description: Protect your devices with comprehensive antivirus, firewall, and identity theft protection from Norton 360.
gifcards.redeem: Download and activate at norton.com with your product key
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Norton 360 subscription only. Subject to Norton License Agreement.

gifcards.title: Zoom Pro License
gifcards.description: Upgrade to Zoom Pro for unlimited group meetings, cloud recording, and advanced admin features.
gifcards.redeem: Upgrade your account at zoom.us with your license code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Zoom Pro subscription only. Subject to Zoom Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Canva Pro Subscription
gifcards.description: Create stunning designs with Canva Pro featuring premium templates, photos, and advanced design tools.
gifcards.redeem: Upgrade at canva.com with your subscription code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Canva Pro subscription only. Subject to Canva Terms of Use.

gifcards.title: Grammarly Premium
gifcards.description: Improve your writing with advanced grammar checking, style suggestions, and plagiarism detection.
gifcards.redeem: Upgrade at grammarly.com with your premium code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Grammarly Premium subscription only. Subject to Grammarly Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Dropbox Plus
gifcards.description: Get 2TB of secure cloud storage with Dropbox Plus, plus advanced sharing and collaboration features.
gifcards.redeem: Upgrade at dropbox.com with your subscription code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Dropbox Plus subscription only. Subject to Dropbox Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Slack Pro Plan
gifcards.description: Enhance team collaboration with Slack Pro featuring unlimited message history and advanced integrations.
gifcards.redeem: Upgrade your workspace at slack.com with your plan code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for Slack Pro subscription only. Subject to Slack Terms of Service.

gifcards.title: Mastercard Prepaid
gifcards.description: Reloadable prepaid Mastercard accepted worldwide. Perfect for online shopping and everyday purchases.
gifcards.redeem: Activate your card online or by phone using the provided instructions
gifcards.termsConditions: Subject to Mastercard Prepaid Terms and Conditions. Fees may apply. Cannot be exchanged for cash.

gifcards.title: Visa Virtual Card
gifcards.description: Secure virtual Visa card for online purchases. Protect your main card details while shopping online.
gifcards.redeem: Access your virtual card details through the provided secure portal
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for online purchases only. Subject to Visa Terms and Conditions. Cannot be exchanged for cash.

gifcards.title: American Express Gift Card
gifcards.description: Premium gift card accepted at millions of locations worldwide. Perfect for special occasions and gifts.
gifcards.redeem: Use like a regular American Express card at participating merchants
gifcards.termsConditions: Subject to American Express Gift Card Terms. Fees may apply. Cannot be exchanged for cash.

gifcards.title: PayPal Digital Gift
gifcards.description: Add funds directly to your PayPal account for secure online payments and transfers worldwide.
gifcards.redeem: Add funds to your PayPal account using the provided redemption code
gifcards.termsConditions: Valid for PayPal account funding only. Subject to PayPal User Agreement. Cannot be exchanged for cash.

gifcards.title: Skrill Prepaid Card
gifcards.description: International prepaid card linked to your Skrill account. Perfect for global transactions and ATM withdrawals.
gifcards.redeem: Activate through your Skrill account dashboard
gifcards.termsConditions: Subject to Skrill Terms and Conditions. International transaction fees may apply.

gifcards.title: Neteller Prepaid Card
gifcards.description: Secure prepaid Mastercard linked to your Neteller e-wallet. Ideal for online gaming and international payments.
gifcards.redeem: Order and activate through your Neteller account
gifcards.termsConditions: Subject to Neteller Terms and Conditions. Account verification required.
